sentence.Network_en: Tongling quartz - vein type deposit lies in south - east Rushan , Shandong Province, within the Sanfushan porphyritic adamellite body.
sentence.Network_cn: 铜岭金矿位于山东省乳山市东南部, 产在三佛山斑状二长花岗岩中, 为含金石英脉型金矿.

sentence.Network_en: The fine - grained crystalline base of porphyritic rock in which larger crystals are embedded.
sentence.Network_cn: 纹理细密的水晶质矿物的基岩,其中嵌有大粒水晶.

sentence.Network_en: Yanshanian acid is a mountain of granite, mostly coarse - grained granite and porphyritic granite.
sentence.Network_cn: 山地属燕山期酸性花岗岩, 多为粗粒花岗岩和斑状花岗岩.

list.abs: porphyritic breccia 斑状角砾岩porphyritic crystal 斑晶porphyritic 斑状
斑状花岗岩(porphyritic granite),亦称“似斑状花岗岩”,具有似斑状结构的花岗岩。花岗岩属侵入岩,容易形成似斑状结构,而一般不会形成斑状结构。具有似斑状结构的花岗岩.
2004年4月2日 -  等粒结构(eguigranular texture):岩石中主要矿物颗粒大小基本一致的结构。 斑状结构(porphyritic texture):岩石中有大小截然不同的结晶颗粒,大颗粒称为斑.
holocrystalline interstitial 全晶间片状的holocrystalline porphyritic 全晶斑状的holocrystalline texture 全晶质结构

means.word_mean: 1. (of rocks) consisting of porphyry or containing large crystals in a fine groundmass of minerals
